channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 29th August
item.description:
A few caravans have arrived yesterday and are dumping rubbish in the plot. They were burning some of it as well.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Peckham Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The shops are all flooded by Bickley Station, 29th August
item.description:
Please can someone come and dredge the drains? The shops are flooded,Buds of Bickley, the sweet shop and the barbers? Please its sooo bad this time even with the red barrier
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road flood, 29th August
item.description:
Everytime it rains the road floods and the water runs down drive way in to house. This has been getting worse over the years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Anglesea Road, Poverest, London

item.title: Flooding at pedestrian crossing, 29th August
item.description:
Heavy rain has caused flooding across the pedestrian crossing including the pavement. This makes it impossible for pedestrians to pass without getting wet feet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Common Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge blocking pavement access, 29th August
item.description:
Hedge at 34 Hazelbourne road is very overgrown and urgently requires cutting back to the boundary. At the moment it’s clearly causing an obstruction which is obviously in violation of the highways act

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelbourne Road, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains blocked along section of A10, 29th August
item.description:
The drains are blocked along the southbound section of the A10 between salmons brook and Churrch Street. Vehicles are constantly splashing water on pedestrians when it rains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A10, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and caravans on vacant land, 29th August
item.description:
Started yesterday. This has been a previous problem which led to fires and graffiti and anti social behaviour which took a long time to sort out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Peckham Road, Peckham, London

item.title: Block drain, 29th August
item.description:
I have previously reported this block drain and the job was completed but clearly it wasn’t done properly !!! Can someone come back and unblock this drain please asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-24, Chapel Street, Belgravia, London

item.title: Litter & faecal matter left by unhoused people, 29th August
item.description:
Lots of rubbish, clothes, and a Santander bike left on the Bessborough Street subways to Pimlico Underground station. I am a station supervisor here and I sympathise with the people sheltering outside my station, however, the Council need to be coming to clean up every day because the mess reflects badly upon TfL, as well as the Council themselves. The Council should be doing much more to help its unhoused population.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-7, Bessborough Street, Millbank, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inefficient draining causing flooding in road, 29th August
item.description:
This has been the case for years and doesn't seem to be properly resolved. The puddles that are created by heavy rain make walking along the pavements impossible if there are any cars going along. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edison Road, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
